query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM market WHERE projectId = 1) as total_mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client WHERE projectId = 1) as total_clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM competitor WHERE projectId = 1) as total_concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lead WHERE projectId = 1) as total_leads,
  (SELECT AVG(qualityScore) FROM lead WHERE projectId = 1) as avg_quality_score;
